name: Perfect Regional Flight: Alaska Airlines Lounge + Horizon Air Q400
description:
Horizon Air is Alaska Airlines’ Regional Partner. 

In this video, I’ll explore Alaska Airlines newest lounge. A 15,800 square foot palace to traveling pleasure located in the North Satellite. It’s got everything a frequent traveler may desire. See it for yourself, but trust me when I say…it may be North America’s best airline lounge!

From there, you’ll see my experience onboard a Horizon Air Dash 8, which is also known as a Bombardier Q400. Horizon Air’s Q400 is a spectacular regional airplane that’s perfect for the missions this Seattle-based carrier requires.

You’ll see the Horizon Air Q400 seats, the Horizon Air service, and the Horizon Air Food. But, best of all, you’ll see some of the best views the United States has to offer. Join me for this remarkable trip!

0:00 Introduction
0:45 Seattle Alaska Airlines Lounge
3:41 Boarding Horizon Air Q400
5:19 Horizon Air Q400 Takeoff
6:48 Horizon Air A400 Landing

For the full take-off and landing experience, click this link
https://youtu.be/af9M4sEQiew

For more trip reports, please subscribe to my channel! 
http://www.JebBrooksFlies.com

MUSIC:

Road 105 - Nihoni
